data.name: Warface - Weapon set "Nuclear"
data.detailed_description:
About the "Nuclear" set


This spectacular weapon series will delight players of any game mode: with the "Nuclear" weapons, you are strong in both special operations and in PVP battles. The unique animation will make you a prominent figure on the battlefield!



The set contains the most useful weapons from the series, which bring an experienced owner to victory under all circumstances.



The set includes four fiery models — one for each class: "Rifleman", "Medic", "Engineer" and "Sniper". The technical characteristics of the guns do not differ from their regular versions

PKP Pecheneg "Nuclear"


A powerful Russian weapon that combines the high firepower of a heavy machine gun and the maneuverability of a lightweight one. Thanks to the impressive damage, the high firing range, and good rate of fire this weapon can easily compete with other models. The gentle recoil fits not only the experienced shooters but also the recruits. It has a large detachable box magazine that holds 200 gun cartridges.

MAG-7 "Nuclear"


Due to the impressive damage, excellent firing range, and good accuracy, this shotgun is a faithful companion in every situation. It has an unusual design and looks like a machine gun, but the very first battle clear everything up! The shotgun has a weak recoil and two slots with a large assortment of attachments for a Medic. The weapon is equipped with a built-in handle. MAG-7’s detachable box magazine fits only five rounds of ammunition, which may not be enough in certain circumstances.

CZ Scorpion Evo3 A1 "Nuclear"


Thanks to the impressive damage, this submachine gun will be a nightmare for your enemies. In proximity, even the most modern helmet won’t save them! The magazine of this machine gun holds 30 cartridges. The CZ Scorpion Evo3 A1 is rightfully regarded as a universal weapon, which can perfectly handle any tasks assigned to it. Compact, powerful, pleasant to use - all that is about CZ Scorpion Evo3 A1.

AX308 "Nuclear"


This is a reliable sniper rifle, the first of the latest generation of weapons from the Arctic Warfare series. It is designed for those who like to solve their problems quickly - the large caliber makes it highly possible to destroy enemies with a single shot, even if it enters the limbs.



Of course, by using this weapon, you can earn a lot of achievements.



After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: The set includes four guns, that literally glow from ionizing radiation! Radiation and lead are especially designed to bring death to your enemies. And it will be damn nice to look at the iridescent camouflage on the weapons.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
